fields.description:
Run the code below in the Windows Emulator.

RESULTS:
Alloy always uses the default template, despite setting the default template to the custom template.

{noformat}
<Alloy>
    <Window backgroundColor="blue">
        <ListView defaultItemTemplate="custom">
            <Templates>
                <ItemTemplate name="custom">
                    <Label bindId="info" color="black" left="60" top="0" />
                    <Label bindId="es_info" color="gray" left="60" top="25" />
                </ItemTemplate>
            </Templates>
            <ListSection headerTitle="Default">
                <ListItem title="stuff" />
                <ListItem title="more stuff"/>
            </ListSection>
            <ListSection headerTitle="Template">
                <ListItem info:text="Carrot" es_info:text="Zanahoria"/>
                <ListItem info:text="Potato" es_info:text="Patata"/>
            </ListSection>
        </ListView>
    </Window>
</Alloy>
{noformat}
fields.summary: Windows: Cannot use custom template for ListView
